hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:He who takes anyone as his ally without the consent of his previous master, there will be the curse of Allah and that of His angels upon him, and neither, any obligatory act of his nor the supererogatory one will be accepted (by Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ تَوَلِّي الْعَتِيقِ غَيْرَ مَوَالِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of a manumitted slave taking anyone as a Mawla except the one who manumitted him
